contest-event.event-date:
May 16, 1953 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Owain Glyndwr Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 5:35 p.m. April 18, 2011, 12:33 a.m. 1 Royston New Monckton Colliery Institute William Foster 2 Woolley Colliery L. Davies 3 Ferodo Works Band George Hespe 4 Oldham RBL Concert Band Leonard Lamb Unknown Result Crookhall Colliery J. J. Stobbs Unknown Result Beswick Prize Albert Risby Unknown Result Hade Edge Albert Robinson Unknown Result Appleby Frodingham Works William H. Kendall Unknown Result Irwell Springs Frederick Lonsdale Garth Unknown Result Crossley's Carpet Works John Harrison Unknown Result Skelmanthorpe Band Willie Kaye Unknown Result Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth
